short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This app uses the Gmail API to auto-delete SPAM and/or TRASH as often as you like!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a web app using the Gmail API to automatically and permanently delete SPAM and/or TRASH from your Gmail folders at any interval you want to set.  Normally these folders delete every 30 days but you can change that to every minute or every day or however often you like.  

BE CAREFUL!  

This delete is PERMANENT and you can easily and accidently delete mail that shouldn't be in SPAM or TRASH!
